block.name: WX GUI Histo Sink
block.make: #set $parent = $notebook() and 'self.%s.GetPage(%s)'%$notebook() or 'self' histosink_gl.histo_sink_f( $(parent).GetWin(), title=$title, num_bins=$num_bins, frame_size=$frame_size, #if $win_size() size=$win_size, #end if ) #if not $grid_pos() $(parent).Add(self.$(id).win) #else $(parent).GridAdd(self.$(id).win, $(', '.join(map(str, $grid_pos())))) #end if
block.doc:
Leave the window blank for the default size, otherwise enter a tuple of (width, height) pixels.
Use the Grid Position (row, column, row span, column span) to position the graphical element in the window.
Use the Notebook Param (notebook-id, page-index) to place the graphical element inside of a notebook page.
